results.title: Fundamentals of human geography: rural land use: dairy farming
results.brief_description: Shows how large areas of counties as far afield as Devon and Cornwall are now given over to producing milk and associated products for the London market.

results.title: Fundamentals of diet
results.brief_description: Outlines types of animals with respect to their food habits and the classes of food in the human body are shown. There are a number of minimum requirements - in food-value and in vitamin content - which the human body must have if it is to be healthy. Experiments carried out on animals demonstrates the results of deprivation of any one or more of these necessities vital to health. The film ends with suggestions for substitutes for various classes of foods which whilst they are vital for health, are often very expensive or unobtainable.

results.title: Fundamentals of carrier telephony. Pt 1.  Principles and applications
results.brief_description: Explains the use of carrier telephoning to increase the number of telephone channels on a single wire without the extra cost of wires etc. Using diagrams it shows how four voices can use the same wires without interference to each user.

results.title: Fundamentals of acoustics. - 2nd ed.
results.brief_description: The phenomenon of hearing, and the modification of sound between its source and its hearer are studied. The velocity of sound, refraction, range of hearing, lowering of intensity, attenuation in air, the elimination of high and low frequencies, reverberation, and the focussing of sound are dealt with in detail.

results.title: Functional anatomy of the hand (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Dissection of a human hand and arm shows the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of hand and individual fingers and presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.
results.description: Dissection of a human hand and arm shows the functional anatomy of the hand. Identifies the nerves and tendons responsible for the movement of hand and individual fingers and presents the procedures and precautions necessary for hand surgery.

results.title: Function of digestion (TEFC)
results.brief_description: A study of the digestive organs and the theory of digestion. Filmed experiments on rabbits discount the mechanical hypotheses of digestion and the effect of saliva on bread, changing starch to glucose, demonstrates the action of digestive enzymes. The wall of the intestine is also shown.
